title: PayPal Shares Fall on Tepid Growth Outlook
sub_head: Payments firm expects revenue for the final three months of the year to be lower than initially expected
body:
Investors took a dim view of PayPal Holdings Inc.’s growth outlook Tuesday, sending shares down sharply in early trading.
The payments firm’s stock fell about 12%, putting it on pace for its second-worst trading day ever. The S&P 500 index fell 0.4%. Shares of the company have been falling in recent months after hitting a high in July.
